info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 6:37PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pierce, northwestern Ware, eastern Bacon and south central Appling Counties through 715 PM EST... At 637 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pebble Hill, or 7 miles northwest of Waycross, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Alma, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Bristol, Dixie Union and New Lacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
